sourcesContent:
import './checkout-item.styles.scss' import { useContext } from 'react' import { CartContext } from '../../contexts/cart.context' const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem}) => { const {clearCartItem,addItemToCart,removeItemFromCart} = useContext(CartContext ) const {name, imageUrl, price, quantity} = cartItem const clearItemHandler = () => clearCartItem(cartItem) return (
{name}
❮
{quantity}
❯
{price}
✕
) } export default CheckoutItem
